name: directly
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: directly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: without anything else being involved or in between

example.eg: Our hotel room was directly above a construction site.
example.egtrans: 我们在酒店住的房间就在建筑工地的上方。

example.eg: The disease is directly linked to poor drainage systems.
example.egtrans: 这种病与下水管线不完善有直接关系。

example.eg: The sun shone directly in my eyes.

dsense.name: directly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: honestly, even when it might make people feel uncomfortable

example.eg: Let me answer that question directly.
example.egtrans: 让我来坦率地回答那个问题吧。

example.eg: "Did you tell him to go?" "Not directly, no."
example.egtrans: “是你让他离开的吗？”“我没直接说，没有。”

dsense.name: directly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: Dr Schwarz will be with you directly.
When you get home you're going directly to bed.

name: directly
posTip: A word used to join parts of a phrase or sentence.

example.eg: Directly he was paid, he went out shopping.
example.egtrans: 他刚一领到钱就出去购物了。

example.eg: I'll be with you directly I've finished this letter.
